32 class spell_item_massive_seaforium_charge : public SpellScript
33 {
34  PrepareSpellScript(spell_item_massive_seaforium_charge);
35 
36  void HandleItemRemove(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
37  {
38  if (!GetHitUnit() || !GetHitUnit()->ToPlayer())
39  return;
40 
41  Player* target = GetHitUnit()->ToPlayer();
42  target->DestroyItemCount(39213, 1, true);
43  }
44 
45  void Register() override
46  {
47  OnEffectHitTarget += SpellEffectFn(spell_item_massive_seaforium_charge::HandleItemRemove, EFFECT_0, SPELL_EFFECT_SUMMON_OBJECT_WILD);
48  }
49 };

58 class spell_item_titanium_seal_of_dalaran : public SpellScript
59 {
60  PrepareSpellScript(spell_item_titanium_seal_of_dalaran)
61 
62  void OnScriptEffect(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
63  {
64  PreventHitDefaultEffect(effIndex);
65 
66  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
67  if (Player* player = caster->ToPlayer())
68  {
69  LocaleConstant loc_idx = player->GetSession()->GetSessionDbLocaleIndex();
70  if (BroadcastText const* bct = sObjectMgr->GetBroadcastText(TITANIUM_SEAL_OF_DALARAN_BROADCAST_TEXT_ID_FLIP))
71  player->TextEmote(bct->GetText(loc_idx, player->getGender()));
72  if (urand(0, 1))
73  {
74  if (BroadcastText const* bct = sObjectMgr->GetBroadcastText(TITANIUM_SEAL_OF_DALARAN_BROADCAST_TEXT_ID_FACE_DOWN))
75  player->TextEmote(bct->GetText(loc_idx, player->getGender()));
76  }
77  else
78  {
79  if (BroadcastText const* bct = sObjectMgr->GetBroadcastText(TITANIUM_SEAL_OF_DALARAN_BROADCAST_TEXT_ID_HEADS_UP))
80  player->TextEmote(bct->GetText(loc_idx, player->getGender()));
81  }
82  }
83  }
84 
85  void Register() override
86  {
87  OnEffectHitTarget += SpellEffectFn(spell_item_titanium_seal_of_dalaran::OnScriptEffect, EFFECT_0, SPELL_EFFECT_SCRIPT_EFFECT);
88  }
89 };

100 class spell_item_mind_amplify_dish : public SpellScript
101 {
102  PrepareSpellScript(spell_item_mind_amplify_dish)
103 
104  void OnDummyEffect(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
105  {
106  PreventHitDefaultEffect(effIndex);
107 
108  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
109  if (Player* player = caster->ToPlayer())
110  {
111  if (Unit* target = GetHitUnit())
112  {
113  // little protection
114  if (target->ToCreature())
115  if (target->ToCreature()->GetCreatureTemplate()->rank > CREATURE_ELITE_NORMAL)
116  return;
117 
118  if (GetSpellInfo()->Id != SPELL_AMPLIFY_10S)
119  if (target->getLevel() > 60)
120  return;
121 
122  uint8 pct = std::max(0, 20 + player->getLevel() - target->getLevel());
123  if (roll_chance_i(pct))
124  player->CastSpell(target, SPELL_MENTAL_BATTLE, true);
125  else if (roll_chance_i(pct))
126  player->CastSpell(target, GetSpellInfo()->Id == SPELL_AMPLIFY_10S ? SPELL_AMPLIFY_CHARM_10S : SPELL_AMPLIFY_CHARM_30S, true);
127  }
128  }
129  }
130 
131  void Register() override
132  {
133  OnEffectHitTarget += SpellEffectFn(spell_item_mind_amplify_dish::OnDummyEffect, EFFECT_0, SPELL_EFFECT_DUMMY);
134  }
135 };

181 class spell_item_goblin_gumbo_kettle : public AuraScript
182 {
183  PrepareAuraScript(spell_item_goblin_gumbo_kettle);
184 
185  void CalcPeriodic(AuraEffect const* /*effect*/, bool& isPeriodic, int32& amplitude)
186  {
187  isPeriodic = true;
188  amplitude = urand(10 * IN_MILLISECONDS, 40 * IN_MILLISECONDS);
189  }
190 
191  void Update(AuraEffect* effect)
192  {
193  PreventDefaultAction();
194  effect->SetPeriodicTimer(urand(10 * IN_MILLISECONDS, 40 * IN_MILLISECONDS));
195  if (Unit* owner = GetUnitOwner())
196  owner->CastSpell(owner, 42755 /*Goblin Gumbo Trigger*/, true);
197  }
198 
199  void Register() override
200  {
201  DoEffectCalcPeriodic += AuraEffectCalcPeriodicFn(spell_item_goblin_gumbo_kettle::CalcPeriodic, EFFECT_0, SPELL_AURA_PROC_TRIGGER_SPELL);
202  OnEffectUpdatePeriodic += AuraEffectUpdatePeriodicFn(spell_item_goblin_gumbo_kettle::Update, EFFECT_0, SPELL_AURA_PROC_TRIGGER_SPELL);
203  }

216 class spell_item_with_mount_speed : public AuraScript
217 {
218  PrepareAuraScript(spell_item_with_mount_speed);
219 
220  bool Validate(SpellInfo const* /*spellInfo*/) override
221  {
222  if (!sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(SPELL_MOUNT_SPEED_CARROT)
223  || !sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(SPELL_MITHRIL_SPURS)
224  || !sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(SPELL_MOUNT_SPEED_RIDING))
225  {
226  return false;
227  }
228  return true;
229  }
230 
231  uint32 getMountSpellId()
232  {
233  switch (m_scriptSpellId)
234  {
235  case SPELL_MOUNT_SPEED_CARROT:
236  return SPELL_CARROT_ON_A_STICK_EFFECT;
237  case SPELL_MITHRIL_SPURS:
238  return SPELL_MITHRIL_SPURS_EFFECT;
239  case SPELL_MOUNT_SPEED_RIDING:
240  return SPELL_RIDING_CROP_EFFECT;
241  default:
242  return 0;
243  }
244  }
245 
246  void OnApply(AuraEffect const* aurEff, AuraEffectHandleModes /*mode*/)
247  {
248  Unit* target = GetTarget();
249  if (target->getLevel() <= 70)
250  {
251  if (auto spellId = getMountSpellId())
252  {
253  target->CastSpell(target, spellId, aurEff);
254  }
255  }
256  }
257 
258  void OnRemove(AuraEffect const* /*aurEff*/, AuraEffectHandleModes /*mode*/)
259  {
260  Unit* target = GetTarget();
261  if (auto spellId = getMountSpellId())
262  {
263  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(spellId);
264  }
265  }
266 
267  void Register() override
268  {
269  OnEffectApply += AuraEffectApplyFn(spell_item_with_mount_speed::OnApply, EFFECT_0, SPELL_AURA_DUMMY, AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL);
270  OnEffectRemove += AuraEffectRemoveFn(spell_item_with_mount_speed::OnRemove, EFFECT_0, SPELL_AURA_DUMMY, AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL);
271  }
272 };

274 class spell_item_magic_dust : public AuraScript
275 {
276  PrepareAuraScript(spell_item_magic_dust);
277 
278  void OnApply(AuraEffect const* /*aurEff*/, AuraEffectHandleModes /*mode*/)
279  {
280  Unit* target = GetTarget();
281  if (target->getLevel() >= 30)
282  {
283  uint8 chance = 100 - std::min<uint8>(100, target->getLevel() - 30 * urand(3, 10));
284  if (!roll_chance_i(chance))
285  PreventDefaultAction();
286  }
287  }
288 
289  void Register() override
290  {
291  OnEffectApply += AuraEffectApplyFn(spell_item_magic_dust::OnApply, EFFECT_0, SPELL_AURA_MOD_STUN, AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL);
292  }
293 };

322  {

338 class spell_item_sleepy_willy : public SpellScript
339 {
340  PrepareSpellScript(spell_item_sleepy_willy);
341 
342  void SelectTarget(std::list<WorldObject*>& targets)
343  {
344  Creature* target = nullptr;
345  for (std::list<WorldObject*>::const_iterator itr = targets.begin(); itr != targets.end(); ++itr)
346  if (Creature* creature = (*itr)->ToCreature())
347  if (creature->IsCritter())
348  {
349  target = creature;
350  break;
351  }
352 
353  targets.clear();
354  if (target)
355  targets.push_back(target);
356  }
357 
358  void HandleScriptEffect(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
359  {
360  PreventHitDefaultEffect(effIndex);
361  Creature* target = GetHitCreature();
362  if (!target)
363  return;
364 
365  GetCaster()->CastSpell(target, GetEffectValue(), false);
366  }
367 
368  void Register() override
369  {
370  OnObjectAreaTargetSelect += SpellObjectAreaTargetSelectFn(spell_item_sleepy_willy::SelectTarget, EFFECT_0, TARGET_UNIT_SRC_AREA_ENTRY);
371  OnEffectHitTarget += SpellEffectFn(spell_item_sleepy_willy::HandleScriptEffect, EFFECT_0, SPELL_EFFECT_SCRIPT_EFFECT);
372  }
373 };

380  {
381  return eventInfo.GetActionTarget() && (eventInfo.GetActionTarget()->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_UNIT || eventInfo.GetActionTarget()->ToCreature()->isWorldBoss());
382  }
383 
384  void HandleProc(AuraEffect const* /*aurEff*/, ProcEventInfo& /*eventInfo*/)

390  }
391

399 class spell_item_shifting_naaru_silver : public AuraScript
400 {
401  PrepareAuraScript(spell_item_shifting_naaru_silver);
402 
403  void OnApply(AuraEffect const* /*aurEff*/, AuraEffectHandleModes /*mode*/)
404  {
405  if (GetTarget() == GetCaster())
406  if (Aura* aur = GetTarget()->AddAura(45044 /*Limitless Power*/, GetTarget()))
407  aur->SetDuration(GetDuration());
408  }
409 
410  void OnRemove(AuraEffect const* /*aurEff*/, AuraEffectHandleModes /*mode*/)
411  {
412  if (Aura* aur = GetTarget()->GetAura(45044 /*Limitless Power*/, GetTarget()->GetGUID()))
413  aur->SetDuration(0);
414  }
415 
416  void OnBaseRemove(AuraEffect const* /*aurEff*/, AuraEffectHandleModes /*mode*/)
417  {
418  GetUnitOwner()->RemoveDynObject(45043);
419  }
420 
421  void Register() override
422  {
423  if (m_scriptSpellId == 45043)
424  {
425  OnEffectApply += AuraEffectApplyFn(spell_item_shifting_naaru_silver::OnApply, EFFECT_0, SPELL_AURA_DUMMY, AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL);
426  AfterEffectRemove += AuraEffectRemoveFn(spell_item_shifting_naaru_silver::OnRemove, EFFECT_0, SPELL_AURA_DUMMY, AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL);
427  }
428  else
429  AfterEffectRemove += AuraEffectRemoveFn(spell_item_shifting_naaru_silver::OnBaseRemove, EFFECT_0, SPELL_AURA_DUMMY, AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL);
430  }

433 class spell_item_toxic_wasteling : public SpellScript
434 {
435  PrepareSpellScript(spell_item_toxic_wasteling);
436 
437  void HandleJump(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
438  {
439  PreventHitDefaultEffect(effIndex);
440  if (Creature* target = GetHitCreature())
441  {
442  GetCaster()->GetMotionMaster()->Clear(false);
443  GetCaster()->GetMotionMaster()->MoveIdle();
444  GetCaster()->ToCreature()->SetHomePosition(target->GetPositionX(), target->GetPositionY(), target->GetPositionZ(), 0.0f);
445  GetCaster()->GetMotionMaster()->MoveJump(target->GetPositionX(), target->GetPositionY(), target->GetPositionZ(), 12.0f, 3.0f, 1);
446  target->DespawnOrUnsummon(1500);
447  }
448  }
449 
450  void HandleScriptEffect(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
451  {
452  PreventHitDefaultEffect(effIndex);
453  }
454 
455  void Register() override
456  {
457  OnEffectLaunchTarget += SpellEffectFn(spell_item_toxic_wasteling::HandleJump, EFFECT_0, SPELL_EFFECT_JUMP);
458  OnEffectHitTarget += SpellEffectFn(spell_item_toxic_wasteling::HandleScriptEffect, EFFECT_1, SPELL_EFFECT_SCRIPT_EFFECT);

474 
475  void HandleDummy(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
476  {
477  PreventHitDefaultEffect(effIndex);
478  Creature* target = GetHitCreature();
479  if (!target)
480  return;
481  if (GetCaster()->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && GetCaster()->ToCreature()->AI())
482  GetCaster()->ToCreature()->AI()->Talk(2);
483  target->DespawnOrUnsummon(500);
484  }
485 
486  void Register() override
487  {
488  if (m_scriptSpellId == 76098)
489  OnEffectHitTarget += SpellEffectFn(spell_item_lil_xt::HandleScriptEffect, EFFECT_0, SPELL_EFFECT_SCRIPT_EFFECT);
490  else
491  OnEffectHitTarget += SpellEffectFn(spell_item_lil_xt::HandleDummy, EFFECT_0, SPELL_EFFECT_DUMMY);

495 class spell_item_essence_of_life : public AuraScript
496 {
497  PrepareAuraScript(spell_item_essence_of_life);
498 
499  bool CheckProc(ProcEventInfo& eventInfo)
500  {
501  SpellInfo const* spellInfo = eventInfo.GetSpellInfo();
502  if (!spellInfo || !spellInfo->HasEffect(SPELL_EFFECT_HEAL))
503  {
504  return false;
505  }
506 
507  return spellInfo->ManaCost > 0 || spellInfo->ManaCostPercentage > 0 || (spellInfo->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_PALADIN && spellInfo->SpellIconID == 156);
508  }
509 
510  void Register() override
511  {
512  DoCheckProc += AuraCheckProcFn(spell_item_essence_of_life::CheckProc);
513  }

542 class spell_item_skull_of_impeding_doom : public AuraScript
543 {
544  PrepareAuraScript(spell_item_skull_of_impeding_doom);
545 
546  void CalculateDamageAmount(AuraEffect const* /*aurEff*/, int32& amount, bool& /*canBeRecalculated*/)
547  {
548  if (!GetCaster())
549  return;
550 
551  amount = GetCaster()->GetMaxHealth() * 0.12f; // 5 ticks which reduce health by 60%
552  }
553 
554  void CalculateManaLeechAmount(AuraEffect const* /*aurEff*/, int32& amount, bool& /*canBeRecalculated*/)
555  {
556  if (!GetCaster() || GetCaster()->getPowerType() != POWER_MANA)
557  return;
558 
559  amount = GetCaster()->GetMaxPower(POWER_MANA) * 0.12f; // 5 ticks which reduce health by 60%
560  }
561 
562  void Register() override
563  {
564  DoEffectCalcAmount += AuraEffectCalcAmountFn(spell_item_skull_of_impeding_doom::CalculateDamageAmount, EFFECT_1, SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE);
565  DoEffectCalcAmount += AuraEffectCalcAmountFn(spell_item_skull_of_impeding_doom::CalculateManaLeechAmount, EFFECT_2, SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_MANA_LEECH);
566  }

582 class spell_item_feast : public SpellScript
583 {
584  PrepareSpellScript(spell_item_feast);
585 
586  bool Load() override
587  {
588  return GetCaster()->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER;
589  }
590 
591  void HandleScriptEffect(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
592  {
593  PreventHitDefaultEffect(effIndex);
594 
595  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
596  if (Player* player = caster->ToPlayer())
597  {
598  LocaleConstant loc_idx = player->GetSession()->GetSessionDbLocaleIndex();
599 
600  switch(GetSpellInfo()->Id)
601  {
602  case SPELL_GREAT_FEAST:
603  if (BroadcastText const* bct = sObjectMgr->GetBroadcastText(GREAT_FEAST_BROADCAST_TEXT_ID_PREPARE))
604  player->TextEmote(bct->GetText(loc_idx, player->getGender()).c_str(), player);
605  break;
606  case SPELL_FISH_FEAST:
607  if (BroadcastText const* bct = sObjectMgr->GetBroadcastText(FISH_FEAST_BROADCAST_TEXT_ID_PREPARE))

669  {

671  Unit::AuraMap const& auras = target->GetOwnedAuras();
672  for (Unit::AuraMap::const_iterator itr = auras.begin(); itr != auras.end(); ++itr)
673  {

677  continue;

684  {
685  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(*itr);
686  }
687  }
688  }

853 class spell_item_fetch_ball : public SpellScript
854 {
855  PrepareSpellScript(spell_item_fetch_ball);
856 
857  void SelectTarget(std::list<WorldObject*>& targets)
858  {
859  Creature* target = nullptr;
860  for (std::list<WorldObject*>::const_iterator itr = targets.begin(); itr != targets.end(); ++itr)
861  if (Creature* creature = (*itr)->ToCreature())
862  {
863  if (creature->GetOwnerGUID() == GetCaster()->GetOwnerGUID() && !creature->IsNonMeleeSpellCast(false) &&
864  creature->GetMotionMaster()->GetCurrentMovementGeneratorType() != POINT_MOTION_TYPE)
865  {
866  target = creature;
867  break;
868  }
869  }
870 
871  targets.clear();
872  if (target)
873  targets.push_back(target);
874  }
875 
876  void Register() override
877  {
878  OnObjectAreaTargetSelect += SpellObjectAreaTargetSelectFn(spell_item_fetch_ball::SelectTarget, EFFECT_0, TARGET_UNIT_SRC_AREA_ENTRY);

1091  for (uint8 count = 0; count < GetEffectValue(); ++count)
1092  {
1093  Position pos = *GetCaster();
1094  GetCaster()->GetClosePoint(pos.m_positionX, pos.m_positionY, pos.m_positionZ, pos.m_orientation, radius, M_PI - 1.2f + 0.3f * urand(0, 8));

1100  summon->SetFaction(GetCaster()->GetFaction());

1103  summon->GetMotionMaster()->MoveFollow(GetCaster(), PET_FOLLOW_DIST, GetCaster()->GetAngle(summon), MOTION_SLOT_CONTROLLED);

1371 enum BlessingOfAncientKings
1372 {
1373  SPELL_PROTECTION_OF_ANCIENT_KINGS = 64413
1374 };
1375 
1376 class spell_item_blessing_of_ancient_kings : public AuraScript
1377 {
1378  PrepareAuraScript(spell_item_blessing_of_ancient_kings);
1379 
1380  bool Validate(SpellInfo const* /*spellInfo*/) override
1381  {
1382  return ValidateSpellInfo({ SPELL_PROTECTION_OF_ANCIENT_KINGS });
1383  }
1384 
1385  bool CheckProc(ProcEventInfo& eventInfo)
1386  {
1387  return eventInfo.GetProcTarget();
1388  }
1389 
1390  void HandleProc(AuraEffect const* aurEff, ProcEventInfo& eventInfo)
1391  {
1392  PreventDefaultAction();
1393 
1394  HealInfo* healInfo = eventInfo.GetHealInfo();
1395  if (!healInfo)
1396  {
1397  return;
1398  }
1399 
1400  int32 absorb = int32(CalculatePct(healInfo->GetHeal(), 15.0f));
1401  // xinef: all heals contribute to one bubble
1402  if (AuraEffect* protEff = eventInfo.GetProcTarget()->GetAuraEffect(SPELL_PROTECTION_OF_ANCIENT_KINGS, 0/*, eventInfo.GetActor()->GetGUID()*/))
1403  {
1404  // The shield can grow to a maximum size of 20,000 damage absorbtion
1405  protEff->SetAmount(std::min<int32>(protEff->GetAmount() + absorb, 20000));
1406 
1407  // Refresh and return to prevent replacing the aura
1408  protEff->GetBase()->RefreshDuration();
1409  }
1410  else
1411  GetTarget()->CastCustomSpell(SPELL_PROTECTION_OF_ANCIENT_KINGS, SPELLVALUE_BASE_POINT0, absorb, eventInfo.GetProcTarget(), true, nullptr, aurEff);
1412  }
1413 
1414  void Register() override
1415  {
1416  DoCheckProc += AuraCheckProcFn(spell_item_blessing_of_ancient_kings::CheckProc);
1417  OnEffectProc += AuraEffectProcFn(spell_item_blessing_of_ancient_kings::HandleProc, EFFECT_0, SPELL_AURA_DUMMY);
1418  }

2099 class spell_item_unsated_craving : public AuraScript
2100 {
2101  PrepareAuraScript(spell_item_unsated_craving);
2102 
2103  bool isException(Unit* target) const
2104  {
2105  switch (target->GetEntry())
2106  {
2107  case NPC_GLUTTONOUS_ABOMINATION:
2108  case NPC_RISEN_ARCHMAGE:
2109  case NPC_BLISTERING_ZOMBIE:
2110  case NPC_BLAZING_SKELETON:
2111  case NPC_SINDRAGOSA:
2112  return true;
2113  default:
2114  return false;
2115  }
2116  }
2117 
2118  bool CheckProc(ProcEventInfo& procInfo)
2119  {
2120  Unit* caster = procInfo.GetActor();
2121  if (!caster || caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
2122  {
2123  return false;
2124  }
2125 
2126  Unit* target = procInfo.GetActionTarget();
2127  if (target && isException(target))
2128  {
2129  return true;
2130  }
2131 
2132  if (!target || target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_UNIT || target->IsCritter() || target->IsSummon())
2133  {
2134  return false;
2135  }
2136 
2137  return true;
2138  }
2139 
2140  // xinef: prevent default proc with castItem passed, which applies 30 sec cooldown to procing of the aura
2141  void HandleProc(AuraEffect const* aurEff, ProcEventInfo& eventInfo)
2142  {
2143  PreventDefaultAction();
2144  eventInfo.GetActor()->CastSpell(eventInfo.GetActionTarget(), GetSpellInfo()->Effects[aurEff->GetEffIndex()].TriggerSpell, TRIGGERED_FULL_MASK);
2145  }
2146 
2147  void Register() override
2148  {
2149  DoCheckProc += AuraCheckProcFn(spell_item_unsated_craving::CheckProc);
2150  OnEffectProc += AuraEffectProcFn(spell_item_unsated_craving::HandleProc, EFFECT_0, SPELL_AURA_PROC_TRIGGER_SPELL);
2151  }
2152 };

2200  bool CheckProc(ProcEventInfo& eventInfo)
2201  {
2202  if (GetTarget()->HasAura(SPELL_SHADOWMOURNE_CHAOS_BANE_BUFF)) // cant collect shards while under effect of Chaos Bane buff
2203  return false;
2204 
2205  // Xinef: Not on BG / Arena
2206  /*if (!GetTarget()->FindMap() || GetTarget()->FindMap()->IsBattlegroundOrArena())
2207  return false;*/
2208 
2209  if (const SpellInfo* procSpell = eventInfo.GetSpellInfo())
2210  {
2211  if (eventInfo.GetDamageInfo() && !eventInfo.GetDamageInfo()->GetDamage())
2212  {
2213  if (!procSpell->SpellFamilyFlags.HasFlag(0x2 | 0x20 | 0x4000, 0x0, 0x0))
2214  return false;
2215  }
2216  else if (procSpell->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_DEATHKNIGHT)
2217  {
2218  if (procSpell->Id != 55078 /*Blood Plague*/)
2219  return false;
2220  }
2221  }
2222 
2223  return true;
2224  }

2227  {
2228  PreventDefaultAction();
2229  GetTarget()->CastSpell(GetTarget(), SPELL_SHADOWMOURNE_SOUL_FRAGMENT, true, nullptr, aurEff);
2230 
2231  // this can't be handled in AuraScript of SoulFragments because we need to know victim
2232  if (Aura* soulFragments = GetTarget()->GetAura(SPELL_SHADOWMOURNE_SOUL_FRAGMENT))
2233  {
2234  if (soulFragments->GetStackAmount() >= 10)
2235  {
2236  GetTarget()->CastSpell(eventInfo.GetProcTarget(), SPELL_SHADOWMOURNE_CHAOS_BANE_DAMAGE, true, nullptr, aurEff);
2237  soulFragments->Remove();
2238  }
2239  }
2240  }

2321  SPELL_POLYMORPH,

2325  SPELL_ENVELOPING_WINDS

2329  void HandleDummy(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
2330  {
2331  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
2332  if (Unit* target = GetHitUnit())
2333  {
2334  uint32 spellId = 0;
2335  uint32 rand = urand(0, 99);
2336  if (rand < 25) // Fireball (25% chance)
2337  spellId = SPELL_FIREBALL;
2338  else if (rand < 50) // Frostball (25% chance)
2339  spellId = SPELL_FROSTBOLT;
2340  else if (rand < 70) // Chain Lighting (20% chance)
2341  spellId = SPELL_CHAIN_LIGHTNING;
2342  else if (rand < 80) // Polymorph (10% chance)
2343  {
2344  spellId = SPELL_POLYMORPH;
2345  if (urand(0, 100) <= 30) // 30% chance to self-cast
2346  target = caster;
2347  }
2348  else if (rand < 95) // Enveloping Winds (15% chance)
2349  spellId = SPELL_ENVELOPING_WINDS;
2350  else // Summon Felhund minion (5% chance)
2351  {
2352  spellId = SPELL_SUMMON_FELHOUND_MINION;
2353  target = caster;
2354  }
2355 
2356  caster->CastSpell(target, spellId, true, GetCastItem());
2357  }
2358  }
2359 
2360  void Register() override
2361  {
2362  OnEffectHitTarget += SpellEffectFn(spell_item_six_demon_bag::HandleDummy, EFFECT_0, SPELL_EFFECT_DUMMY);

3031  spell_id = caster->GetTeamId() == TEAM_ALLIANCE ? SPELL_MOUNT_RAM_100 : SPELL_MOUNT_KODO_100;

3033  spell_id = caster->GetTeamId() == TEAM_ALLIANCE ? SPELL_MOUNT_RAM_60 : SPELL_MOUNT_KODO_60;
3034  break;
3035  case SPELL_BREWFEST_MOUNT_TRANSFORM_REVERSE:
3036  if (caster->GetSpeedRate(MOVE_RUN) >= 2.0f)
3037  spell_id = caster->GetTeamId() == TEAM_HORDE ? SPELL_MOUNT_RAM_100 : SPELL_MOUNT_KODO_100;
3038  else
3039  spell_id = caster->GetTeamId() == TEAM_HORDE ? SPELL_MOUNT_RAM_60 : SPELL_MOUNT_KODO_60;
3040  break;
3041  default:
3042  return;
3043  }
3044  caster->CastSpell(caster, spell_id, true);
3045  }
3046  }
3047 
3048  void Register() override
3049  {
3050  OnEffectHitTarget += SpellEffectFn(spell_item_brewfest_mount_transformation::HandleDummy, EFFECT_0, SPELL_EFFECT_DUMMY);
3051  }

3444 class spell_item_recall : public SpellScript
3445 {
3446  PrepareSpellScript(spell_item_recall);
3447 
3448  void SetDest(SpellDestination& dest)
3449  {
3450  Player* player = GetCaster()->ToPlayer();
3451  if (!player)
3452  {
3453  return;
3454  }
3455 
3456  TeamId bgTeam = player->GetBgTeamId();
3457  if (player->GetTeamId(true) != bgTeam)
3458  {
3459  if (SpellTargetPosition const* recallSpellTarget = sSpellMgr->GetSpellTargetPosition(bgTeam == TEAM_HORDE ? SPELL_RECALL_HORDE : SPELL_RECALL_ALLIANCE, EFFECT_0))
3460  {
3461  Position pos = Position(recallSpellTarget->target_X, recallSpellTarget->target_Y, recallSpellTarget->target_Z, recallSpellTarget->target_Orientation);
3462  dest.Relocate(pos);
3463  }
3464  }
3465  }
3466 
3467  void Register() override
3468  {
3469  OnDestinationTargetSelect += SpellDestinationTargetSelectFn(spell_item_recall::SetDest, EFFECT_0, TARGET_DEST_DB);
3470  }
3471 };
